[Comment]

Comment post. This thread is specifying the way the software is formatting the  pickup manager  orders table post.

The language syntax and features are the same as [Spec Pickup Driver Message vOneKitchen3.0.0](https://go.helpberkeley.org/t/spec-driver-message-vonekitchen3-0-0/6599).

[Comment]
Empty post to allow for easier reorganizing of posts.

[OrdersTable]

"Hello ops managers, CustomerCare dispatchers and pickup managers, here is the driver → member → username → orders table:\n\n"

"\n"
